Reviews.Content: Great camera, low price, nice photos.This is not a professional Camera. Is just an amateur camera with advanced options.I highly recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: ALEJANDRO FROM VZLA
Reviews.Author: ALEJANDRO MANEIRO
Reviews.Content: I buy a lot of stuff from Amazon and I have never had a problem returning anything so here's my advice to you; buy it and try it, if it doesn't work; return it for a refund, even if it is open and has been used. No other web site allows you to do this!

Reviews.Title: Great price for a 1st timer
Reviews.Author: Venus Dunbar
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 20 year old daughter.  It was easy to work and perfect for anyone who doesn't like a lot of buttons, but a bit cheap.  Broke easily :(

Reviews.Title: Not Bad at all
Reviews.Author: Dwayne Keith Mobley
Reviews.Content: I still have this item and it works pretty dam good I must say.  We just got to take picture of Rockefellers center Xmas Tree, this year.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: Carrie
Reviews.Content: I like this camera overall. I am not much of a photo person but it takes good enough pictures. As with most camera's, I don't understand some of the options for focus, etc. I suspect it might be a piece of cake for an experienced photographer :)

Reviews.Title: My wife loves her new GE camera.
Reviews.Author: Dr. Horrible F. Wingnut
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife.  Same or better specs, better price.  You know all electronics come out of the same few factories, right ?

Reviews.Title: Highly recomended
Reviews.Author: DJH Student
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best cameras for the price. I Highly recommend this to this day. This camera performs excellently.

Reviews.Title: This camera is awesome!
Reviews.Author: mylovemike
Reviews.Content: I love being able to capture all the great moments with this camera! It was perfect for all my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great Step up from the basic Point and Shoot.
Reviews.Author: Jimmy C. Roland
Reviews.Content: This is a great starter camera, love the way it feels and how it performs, small and compact but has a great punch, the photo's are sharp and crisp, the "Pan" photo option is awesome because you can create different style of photo's with a 180* degree* view... would recommend this camera to anyone that wants the feel of a DSLR, and something better than a Basic Point and shoot style camera, that is just as Easy to use or user friendly.....

Reviews.Title: Broke after two uses
Reviews.Author: hydrocynus
Reviews.Content: I probably got a lemon but the lens is stuck in the protruded position. I tried everything to reset the camera with no luck.First time with this brand and I likely will not renew the experience. Hydro.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Joanne Edelstein
Reviews.Content: After just a little use the on/off button stopped working.  It was still under warranty so I sent it back and it was repaired.  Haven't had any trouble since.  A lot of camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera.
Reviews.Author: G. Mauzy
Reviews.Content: Great camera that takes care of all your needs. Super focus and nice looking. Grab one if you can for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Camera wins!
Reviews.Author: Michael G. Norris
Reviews.Content: Bought for granddaughter for Christmas present.  I thought it would not be appreciated as it would not work that well.  I was surely wrong.  She loves it and it takes great pictures.  Amazon handled the transaction with their usually professionalism, quickly and completely.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: B. Heller
Reviews.Content: Bought for Christmas two years ago for my mother. She still loves it and it still works perfect. She is no photographer or anything but every picture comes out amazing.

Reviews.Title: never again
Reviews.Author: Angelyka
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera about 2 years ago and i should have send it right back at that time - I used it couple of times since and now I tried to trade it in and the response was that it's worth about $4. I have a 2MP old camera and I preferred to use that or the cell's camera because this one from the begining it came up with the message "file not found" after I took lots of picture - sometime was working and I had to turn it on and off all the time for this, loosing a lot of good moment memories. I tried few SDHC cards and same thing happened every time - I see very happy customers but my opinion is that this camera it's junk at good price.

Reviews.Title: Good gift idea
Reviews.Author: tristan nino maltos-james jr.
Reviews.Content: This camera takes GREAT macro photos close up and has a good zoom.I gave it to my mother after I got an slr.

Reviews.Title: A great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Edward Becerra "Edward A Becerra"
Reviews.Content: I bought an X5 at one of Amazon's competitors, MicroCenter in Denver, Colorado. Mine was an open box/display unit that cost me a mere $119.Less than half a day later, I was already using it to shoot photos at the StarFest science fiction/fantasy convention at the Denver Tech Center. It performed admirably!As it was my first superzoom, I expected the learning curve to be steep. It wasn't. The X5 really delivered.On the down side, the automatic setting can become confused in settings where you are in deep darkness and the subject is in bright light, such as a stage performance, or a room that's "bright" to the human eye, but not to the camera. Learning to use the manual settings deals with this nicely, and after a bit of practice with choosing shutter speed and ISO, I was taking photos like... well, perhaps not a pro, but definitely an enthusiastic amateur.And it has one advantage that makes up for small sins - it's one of the few inexpensive superzooms that still has a VIEWFINDER! Hurrah! I wear glasses and have shaky hands. Being able to stabilize things by holding the camera up to my eyes and looking through a viewfinder makes framing a shot MUCH easier.The use of AA batteries is another plus - I shoot a LOT of photos during the costume contest at StarFest, and to be honest, a single Lithium battery wasn't going to make it through the night. Not even two batteries would. But a sixteen-pack of cheap AA batteries saw me through almost 1200 photos that night. If you're going to take a lot of photos in a short period of time, this is very helpful. And it can still use standard rechargeable AA batteries, if you're concerned about recycling.Customer support was also grand - I needed a new lens cap, and emailed GE asking for information as to where I could buy one. They sent me one for free.Finally, while at the StarFest, I saw people with incredibly costly cameras. They were easy to spot - they were the ones who flinched every time you got within arms length of them. At $119, the X5 (and presumably it's newer cousin, the X500) can be replaced without your wallet screaming in agony.If you want a superzoom and don't have bottomless pockets, the X5 just works. It has its limits and its flaws, but for the price, it can't be beaten.

Reviews.Title: great to do business with
Reviews.Author: Mike Jones
Reviews.Content: This merchant was Great to do business with.  The order was shipped fast and when received, it was just as described.

Reviews.Title: The Most Excellent Camera I have Ever Used
Reviews.Author: PhotoMemoriesbyJC
Reviews.Content: I have been an avid photography Hobbiest since I was old enough to hold a camera in my hand. My ex husband and I had a great 35 mil camera, professional, he had purchased while in High school for a photography class he had, I took it over once we got married and began learning how to use one so sophisticated.Since the digital age has come to a new world of point and shoots, digicams, and dslrs, I have been searching and searching for just the right camera to do what I love to do... Take pictures.I have used so many different inexpensive cameras, all the way up to more expensive dslrs that I still cannot afford yet. I have done my own fair share of shopping, trying out, and figuring out what I wanted in a camera. When I found the GE X5. It was inexpensive compared to the others that I was looking at and comparing to, but when I began to look, touch, hold, and shoot pictures and compare everything, I decided this was the one for me.Was I right!!! I have photographed everything from newborn babies, toddler milestone shoots, candid photo sessions with kids at the park, sports photos of soccer, volleyball, and football teams, cheerleaders, and so much more. Senior Pictures, Engagement Photos, Landscapes, sunsets, storms, clouds, and even weddings. I have never had a camera that could hold its own in photo quality to a professional DSLR camera, but this one takes the cake. In my own experience of zooming in quality photos, I have even zoomed in with this little camera and got the most amazing details of the moon, the craters, caverns, and so much more... The detail looked like I used a telescope and snapped it... AMAZING!!!The quality of these photos allow me to blow them up to poster sizes, retouch, edit, and even do specialty edits without distorting, changing the photo or adding too much noise or pixilating to the photo. In short, I LOVE THIS CAMERA. I just bought another camera this week, as a birthday present to myself, but, in reality, I think I am sticking with the GE X series cameras. I can't imagine switching to another brand when everything I want and need is in one camera.The only true CON I have had with this camera is 2 things...1. Continuous photos can only be done on timer, the processing time between shots is a little long for good, fast photo secession, but I have found that in all these types of cameras.2. A few times when I was recording on MOV mode, the sound was drowned out with a buzzing noise. But that seems to have resolved itself. Thankfully, I use it often.

Reviews.Title: I Love This Camera
Reviews.Author: Kalaab M. Pickering
Reviews.Content: I've owned this camera for over a year now, and it has been one of the best purchases I've ever made.  This camera is a versatile, reliable workhorse.  You can really grow into its features if you're like I was when I bought it, which is to say a point-and-shoot only photographer.I didn't really get into photography prior to the digital revolution, and my first few forays into the field were mainly with good-quality point-and-shoot rigs.  However, as I developed my skills, it became clear that even a great point-and-shoot camera wasn't refined enough for what I wanted to do.  Specifically, I wanted to be able to manually set f/stops, white balance, ISO settings, and shutter speed.  Some of those features are available in point-and-shoot cameras, but usually not all of them in combination.  The GE X5 fit my needs perfectly.First, a few negatives: the camera seems bulky compared to point-and-shoot rigs.  This is a relative point, however; this thing looks like a roll of mints compared to some DSLR's I've used.  Second, there's no manual focus, but I'm not sure there are any "bridge" cameras like the X5 that have that as a feature.I was repeatedly impressed by the X5's repeated comparison to the DSLR category.  Granted, this is not a DSLR and can't really be considered a "professional" camera, but its features fit the bill even for particular enthusiasts like myself.The camera's form is reminiscent of a DSLR, which is to say big but ergonomic.  The lens on the front is a good size without being front-heavy.  The flip-up flash is as easy as it gets; open it, and the flash is on, close it and it's off.  The zoom lever is at a good position and is easy to reach.  The camera also features a digital view finder, a must for me, since I don't much care for sighting in pictures with the LCD screen.  But, the X5 does have a nice, bright LCD screen that makes the process enjoyable when I do choose to use it.The camera has many different modes, including video, panorama, and auto mode.  The auto mode consistently yields high-quality photos at most light conditions.  In video mode, the quality is lacking, making this camera less than ideal in this category.  The panorama mode seemed like it was going to be great, but even with a tripod the camera has a tendency to yield a cartoonish and malformed picture.  This wasn't a big deal to me, because I prefer to assemble panoramic shots manually through Photoshop.Speaking of manual operations, I cannot stress how liberating it is to have a camera with so many features available to set manually.  I've captured everything from hummingbirds at high speed to fireworks at night, and the manual mode ensures that you can consistently dial in everything you need to capture the perfect shot.  I have a hard time with auto modes in general, even on a camera as great as the X5, so having the ability to tinker with the camera to yield the results you want is critical to my photography technique.  There are a lot of people out there who feel that having to adjust the camera so finely interferes with the photography process in general, but one of my favorite aspects of photography is knowing that the input I give my camera consistently makes the difference between a good photo and a great one.My philosophy with cameras is the same as with guitars or computers: use what you have until you outgrow it.  If you don't outgrow your equipment, don't upgrade.  The X5 was the perfect camera for me to step up to.  The quality of my photographs has improved vastly since this purchase.  A lot of photographers say "Cameras don't take great pictures, photographers do."  I'll agree with that to a certain extent, but there's a reason why pros don't shoot weddings with point-and-shoot cameras.  Their needs are beyond what can be supplied by lesser equipment.  If you're at the point where you know your point-and-shoot isn't giving you what you need, stop right now and buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: ge camera
Reviews.Author: kerdelle
Reviews.Content: ok i bought this camera at kmart for 69$. I love it take good pic, its not the best but a very good camera. if you are looking for a good camera this is the one, but it has its bad side you can not buy a better lenes for it.

Reviews.Title: A lot of camera for a low price
Reviews.Author: Phillymark
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a bridge between a point and shoot and a digital SLR.  It fulfills the job admireably.  It is easy to use but with the advantage of 15X zoom and a multitude of settings, it delivers an excellant quality photo.

Reviews.Title: GE X5 Power Pro Series
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: The camera was worth the cheap price I got it for, but I would never recommend buying one at store price.  It isn't very clear and has a lot of problems taking pictures in focus.  It's also hard to change settings.  The buyer was very reliable; delivered what was listed and didn't rip me off.

Reviews.Title: Not bad of a camera for general photos
Reviews.Author: Stormy1
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these GE digital cameras, the model X-5 earlier this year [2011]to replace an older Fuji Finepix S1000 digital camera that finally died after 4 years of taking excellent pictures for me. The 15X optical zoom is pretty good and is a bit longer than on the older Fuji S1000 which had an 12X optical zoom. This GE X-5 digital camera reminds me quite a bit like my prior Fuji digital camera and one other camera brand I spotted elsewhere, so using this digital camera is generally quite easy. I am a bit picky with how good I want my photos to turn out and I don't expect DSLR-quality photos, but overall picture quality with this camera is quite acceptable for me. Videos comes out pretty good with this camera. Features are plentiful for a low-priced "super-zoom" digital camera.The only drawbacks were few: poor macro zoom, short battery life, picture quality not quite as good as my older & lower powered Fuji Finepix S1000 digital camera, and finally a loose lense cap. Indoor pictures seems to be a bit "darker" than normal, but still not too bad.So, overall I would recommend the GE X5 digital camera if you are going to use it for general photography, outdoor pictures or short video clips.

Reviews.Title: Very impressive
Reviews.Author: mohamed salmen
Reviews.Content: It's my favorite, great price and convenient, easy to use, I like it and use it often, you may ask them more in the coming days, it is worth trying ...

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Arrived before the date posted, really good. and easy to use, only had a couple of shots that didn't come out right, but probably my error.

Reviews.Title: Acceptable performance overall
Reviews.Author: Travis Juntara "Frug-O-taku"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera looking ahead to a photography course I wanted to take 3 months later. I didn't get into that class, but after becoming aptly familiar with the camera and its various settings. This is my first "pro" camera, and it's been quite a ride.The lens is excellent (4.9mm is roughly 28mm at a 35mm equivalence and 15x that is like 400mm or something). Macro mode works like a dream. The good pictures taken with this yielded crisp and clear pictures. You can zoom in with some of the larger pictures, and it will be far from perfect, but you can't expect that level of detail with only a 1/2.3" CCD sensor.Now let me talk about the "bad" pictures.Low-light performance is horrible. This camera is plagued by both horrible noise performance at ISO's above 800 and blurry pictures from the "good, but not good enough" electronic image stabilizer reduced a handful of my images to being worthy of only a VGA resize on the web (to be fair, I keep my image stabilization at regular not "+" most of the time). Turning off the Auto-focus beam increases the chances of the picture being out of focus. Sometimes I turn it off as a courtesy to my subjects, or animals I happen to be taking pictures of.Even in the best of conditions, though, I expect this camera to pump out good prints at up to A4 sizes. It's not the smartest sensor, either, since it had managed to underexpose one of my perfectly well lit pictures (out of ~80 pictures taken whilst on Program AE with EV=0.0). Luckily it has a OSD histogram picture (a feature I didn't know how to use at the time)Though I have an inkling that the "screw a tennis ball to the camera mount", or the "set to 2-second self-timer and focus on holding steady" tricks will work wonders, I would invest some money on a cheap mono-pod just to have it handy in the case of lowlight pictures if you're like me and refuse to use un-diffused/un-softened flash.This camera is definitely capable of taking good pictures (it's excellent with enough lighting), though it's not as "smart" as your run-of-the-mill Point & Shoot, it gives you those pro features to compensate for that. So if you're willing to take the time to really get to know this camera, this is a very capable low-budget camera, and a very good one if you can work past the limitations. On the other hand, you can bomb some potentially good (well composed) pictures if you didn't check your exposure, focus, and blur (though these can be post-processed or resized to be less noticeable).Oh. and yes. there is a whirring-ish noise when you record videos. so if you want videos check out that next model: the GE X500, they might've fixed all of the problems I've had with this one, who knows?

Reviews.Title: Good product, Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: SSodhi
Reviews.Content: The GE X5, is comparable to a lot of more expensive cameras and is, in my opinion almost equally good.I bought this one around the same time my girlfriend bought a more expensive Canon with similar specs. While her camera has higher zoom (26x as opposed to 15x), everything else is about the same- however she payed almost double of what I did.While not entirely user friendly, it is learnable, just takes time and effort.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Micarowan
Reviews.Content: This is an inexpensive intermediate camera. Takes great photos even for the not so experienced user. Has plenty of features should one know/learn more about getting into photography specifics. For my level of skill/knowledge it is the perfect fit. While the D-SLR's are amazing cameras,they were too pricey and for me too advanced to delve into yet. I liked this brand over the others mainly because of the price. In fact I liked it so much I found a gift pack bundle to get my mother in law as an early mother's day present.

Reviews.Title: perfect pictures
Reviews.Author: lorrie4you
Reviews.Content: this camera is so wonderful I am going to purchase one for a wedding gift. the pictures are wonderful I love the zoom.and had some fun with the video too

Reviews.Title: GE X5 PowerPro Camera 14.1Mp 15xOptical zoom
Reviews.Author: Raphael L. Balser
Reviews.Content: Haven't had time to try all the features. Those that I have tried or "played with" really impressed me. If it lasts 5 - 10 years I'd probably replace/upgrade it with a similar GE camera

Reviews.Title: GE X5 14.1MP Digital
Reviews.Author: B2
Reviews.Content: Outstanding camera and vidio recorder for the price (<$110), provided you take the time to search the web and wait for ground delivery! Add a 4 to 16 Gig chip AA batteries and start shooting / recording. Easy to use and light weight for the package. The panoramic function is a bit awkward, but yiels some nice results. Apature recovery is very slow comaired to SLR's, but at 1/10th the cost you can't expect much more!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Roadhousey2k
Reviews.Content: Good price-quality combination, excellent quality print outs! The camera is only 2.5 months old so you would not expect any problems, but so far so good.

Reviews.Title: My brandy spankin new camera!
Reviews.Author: hismummy08
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! Ive not purchased a new digital camera in 5 years now and when I saw this camera I loved it! It takes the BEST pictures!It truly is like having a big giant professional camera in a small compact one;)even though it looks big it practically has a handle on it making it comfortable! Honestly the only downer to it is that when its hooked up to the computer it seems to drain a little more battery life than usual! But its perfectly fine with me because all regular use of panoramic photos and video use or hundreds of pictures in a day barely put a dent in the batteries;)I truly do think this camera is way more worth the money than the nikon or canon cameras!

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Karen Kraus
Reviews.Content: I researched cameras with a large optical zoom. For the price, this camera is perfect. The zoom works great and the time between pictures is satisfactory. Waiting for the camera to focus is a bit frustrating while learning to use the camera. I found I was to close to the subject. I also love the panorama mode. It is very cool! I am very happy with my purchase and the value.

Reviews.Title: great camera, great price
Reviews.Author: EdEKit
Reviews.Content: I enjoy modifying photos, and needed a camera with higher resolution to get into some of the smaller details of photos. This Camera certainly is an improvement.  It is fairly easy to use, but there is a learning curve.  Set to the Auto mode, it is a virtual point and shoot.  The other settings are easy to understand, and very effective.  I particularly like the panorama feature.The user manual is concise, the camera has features that allow a lot of choices.  If there is a single flaw, it's the auto focus feature.  pressing the shutter release too quickly will almost always result in an out of focus picture.  And I would like a socket for a remote flash attachment.  The built in flash works well for most pictures, but in the macro closeup configuration it casts a shadow from the lens on the subject.  And, the location of the SD card socket requires opening the battery box for access.

Reviews.Title: Over 1,000 pictures and I'm still loving it.
Reviews.Author: itsmejb
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my old camera died. I wanted something with better quality and more mega pixels. I searched for something affordable but wasn't going to die one a year later. If I could rate the shipping process on this whole ordeal I would rate it a zero. I ordered it and three days late the status of my package was delivered. I went to check the mail and no camera. Apparently fed ex delivered my camera to someone who wasn't me. I called the distributor in Florida and they sent me another one which took three weeks to get here. I hope someone is enjoying their free camera. After getting it I immediately started taking pictures the first few were a bit blurry so I read the manual. Now all of my pictures a crisp and clear and print out great!

Reviews.Title: GE digital camera
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: This camera is just as described. It is easy to use and takes good pictures. It shipped quickly and I have used it quite often. Great buy for the price. I wish they had included the memory card as it is necessary in order to use the camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality for a really low price.
Reviews.Author: Ruben
Reviews.Content: I needed a new camera since mine is already almost 7 years old, (3.1 mp), and did not want one of those small compact camera that even though have great features, they did not suit me at all like a professional looking camera. A little browsing on cameras on amazon and I stumbled on this sexy looking camera. It had everything I was looking for. Really high MP (14.1), digital optical zoom, high quality material, many features, and best of all, looks like one of those professional looking camera used by photo professional studios, yet its not too heavy on the hands and its easy to grab and carry. TO my greatest surprise this camera arrived just 2 days before Christmas and started to use it right away.TO really take advantage of this camera, I did what other reviewers suggested and took time to read the online manual from the CD and GE website. Once I got a general idea of how to start using this camera with the best beginner settings, I started taking some great looking photos with such high quality images. All my friends and family love how the pictures of this camera comes out and more surprised to heard how much I paid for it.Battery consumption its good to. If you do some small changes on the setting on this camera it will give you a much longer battery life. Video and sound quality are excellent to. I took some videos on this camera and they look great when you play them on your PC. Only draw back it s the .MOV format that uses to code the videos. Would love to have MP4,AVI options as well. But overall an impressive looking camera with amazing quality pictures and very easy on the dollar.

Reviews.Title: great camera great price
Reviews.Author: virginia
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera for my 19 yr old daughter and was a little worried about it because it was sooo much cheaper then cameras similAR OR JUST LIKE, but after she got it and used it my my worries were put to rest, she just loves it and it has all the same if not more features then then the more expensive cameras that are similar to or just like this one. so i rate this camera as awesome and u wont be disappointed

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: P. Langley "byaya3"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 11 year old for Christmas and got a really nice price. She has found it very easy to use and the picture quality was better than I expected.The amount of optical zoom works well to get quick, quality pics of her brother wrestling from a distance. Like any digital camera it uses battery life very quickly. This is her first real decent camera and she has had no problems working it. GE did a nice job on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Price! Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Bean
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this camera so far.  I use it in my appraisal business so I take a lot of pictures.  I like the features it has.  The price was very good.

Reviews.Title: camera with a view finder
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Klein
Reviews.Content: Finally a inexpensive digital camera with a view finder.  This one can be used in Arizona where the sun washes out the image on the screen.  It is a little larger than I would have liked but in order to get the optical magnification increasingt the size was necessary.

Reviews.Title: Great quality camera and great price- you won't be disappointed!
Reviews.Author: bargain shopper of the year
Reviews.Content: I was in search for a SLR camera.  When I did a search on amazon for camera the results showed me this.  After reading the previous reviews of the camera I thougth I'd try it.  I purchased it for my husband for Christmas 2010 and now he can't put it down.  People think its an expensive camera due to the weight of it but its actually a digital camera not and SLR.Oh, and price you can't beat ANYWHERE. The quaility of the pictures are amazing!!signedONE SATISFIED CUSTOMER!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Edward S. Forde
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for a Olympus FE-110.  This camera has amazed me straight out of the box.  I am not a pro.  I squandered a bit to learn the features of the camera.  You better read the instructions first.  It makes a world of difference when you start taking pictures.  Hold the button half way and then click all the way make a big difference in the quality of shots it takes.

Reviews.Title: great for the money
Reviews.Author: eyeball
Reviews.Content: a great camera for the money , dont need the small version camera's , this one is way better then them , fast shipping from company , must read booklet to fully understand functions , but very easy to use , quality of the pictures is great with and without flash , about time some company put out a digital worth the money

Reviews.Title: It does exactly what I wanted it to do!
Reviews.Author: Jute196
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera specifically for using the macro feature to take photos of my jewelry for my online shop. The photos are everything I hoped for and more. I also used it to make movies of my family at Christmas and found the image and sound quality great. This camera is a little powerhouse and I still can't believe how reasonably priced it was. You can see some of the photos of my jewelry at [...]

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: The Az Snowman
Reviews.Content: I was a little apprehensive about this product because of the price. It just seemed to be too cheap for what it was. I was pleasntly surprised when I first used it! It does everything GE says it does. I have no complaints about this camera. It is touted as a 'Point and Shoot' but it does SO much more!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: cvsisinthehouse
Reviews.Content: Its been said point and shoots are on the way out.  Not if I can help it.  This is a very nice camera.  Its got way too many features for my primitive mind, but still takes very good shots.  I occasionally have trouble snapping the shutter when I am not taking a pic of somebody's face.  I am too lazy to reread the manual to see what the deal is.  I like the look and feel of it also.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' my GE
Reviews.Author: LTSlimm
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is easy for me to use and the quality of the shots I have been getting is awesome. I have used it in the daytime and at night and the outcome is fantastic. I am a little leary of the sd card loading in with the batteries but that is only because my crappy Nikon had reoccuring issues with the battery door breaking. This batter door seems sturdier then the Nikon's but time will tell.I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: crcar
Reviews.Content: I was unsure about this product when I was researching it because it seemed like it was too good of a deal for the price however I think it was one of my best decisions to buy this camera.  I have only had it for about a month but so far I love it.  Would recommend this camera to anyone wanting quality pictures for a low price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for price paid
Reviews.Author: Alton W. Yates
Reviews.Content: This camera greatly exceeded my expectations and performs far better than many costing ten times as much. I highly recommend it for those who want a superior product without the high cost.

Reviews.Title: great bargain camera
Reviews.Author: cautious buyer
Reviews.Content: Not fancy but adequate for many functions. Solid. You can easily pay much more for a camera that will do much less. No HD video but cost is just over $100.

Reviews.Title: X5 Camera
Reviews.Author: PAS
Reviews.Content: This camera is much better then I thought it would be...easy to use...and when directions are followed takes wonderful pictures.  The buttons make it easy to switch back and forth between options.  Really enjoying the camera.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Misty Blue
Reviews.Content: This item was given to my daughter as a gift and she was very pleased with it.  It was exactly what she wanted.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera
Reviews.Author: Packdaddy
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have ever owened. It's easy to use. I think it will be a long time befor I replace this one.

Reviews.Title: GE Camera
Reviews.Author: P. Bertelone "Patsy B"
Reviews.Content: Still learning all the different settings. But I love my new camera. I am having fun with it. Great camera, good quality & easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: J. Jones "If you do what you did then you get...
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift. The recipient is not a photographic expert and only used to point and shoot cameras. She is enjoying the camera very much. Only used it for a few days so far and no complaints. The panoramic element on the camera is amazing how well the picture comes out. Picture could be better when at maximum optical zoom. . .

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: tx-lonestar1989
Reviews.Content: We purchased this GEX5Pro 14mp camera back in November 2010,(price went down since then)so far works great.We only use it occasionally,mostly family pictures,and outdoors with our pets,i took some pictures of a blue jay nesting high on our oak tree and this camera zoomed in really well and pics are really clear,of course a tripod helps when zooming in that far.Not too complicated,fun and easy to use. lots of options that we have not used yet.zooms in really nice,photos are sharp and clear. We also purchased a class-6 SD card to go with it and combined both products have more than met our expectations.I would recommend this camera to those looking for a value camera that is a little more than a point and shoot with plenty of options to play with. Looks really nice and appears to be an expensive camera,also it has both a viewer and a 2.7 inch screen,the blink detection is a nice feature to alert you to retake picture. Video quality is good but not great in low light,does not record HD video , however video quality in the right conditions is really good in my opinion . So if you are interested in a really overall good  picture taking camera for a great price this is a solid purchase.have fun camera shopping!

Reviews.Title: NICE CAMERA GREAT FEATURES
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS LOADED WITH GREAT FEATURES FAR MORE THAN MOST USERS WOULD EVER USE BUT IT IS USER FRIENDLY FOR EVERYDAY CASUAL PICTURE TAKING.THE GE X5 PRO SERIES CAMERA IS HIGHLY RECOMENDED

Reviews.Title: GE X5 Review
Reviews.Author: Morales
Reviews.Content: I've used Canon, Nikon, Lumix, Kodak, Sony photography cameras. NONE OF THEM ARE COMPARED TO THIS CAMERA. 14 MEGA PIXELS! 15X OPTICAL ZOOM. ALL THIS FOR LIKE $110. This is a $500/600 camera, you're saving so much. This camera is incredible, the pictures are so colorful, clear and SHARP. SO CRISP. I LOVE IT. I will never ever regret getting this camera, the lens shine with rainbow colors. The zoom's incredible. It's the smallest camera that can do all these features like smile, face, blink detections. Oh My Gosh. BUY THE CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: GE X5 Pro Series
Reviews.Author: Joseph Gonzales "jojo blue"
Reviews.Content: I like this product.  Not sure about the battery life maybe got some bad batteries  they see to have lasted only a few days but over all i like the picture quality  is great

Reviews.Title: Its OK BUT
Reviews.Author: Mar "Marinera"
Reviews.Content: Its really heavy because of the AA batterys i hate.indoors are much better than out doors.I read reviews before of this camera(not here) the pics was not sharp . i have to agree on it.nice zoom. good for the price. but just average camera.and sorry my english !!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Camera did not work
Reviews.Author: whatchacallit
Reviews.Content: The camera came on when I put batteries in . The lens came out and that was it . No pix taken and will not work . Responses from Capital very vague and slow to come . Not Happy!!Changed batteries to no avail .

Reviews.Title: Nice Pictures! Sometimes
Reviews.Author: F. Cernada
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because many of the reviews were positive. However, I was disappointed with the results. Indoor picture quality is just not acceptable. The flash works on and off,  every 3 or 4 pictures maybe. Sometimes it does not fire at all even after using a forced flash setting in the flash menu. When it worked it was so strong that most of the pictures came white. Outside the house  the picture quality is good with strong sunlight.  However, results vary. The zoom is great. My Sony 6 megapixel camera took better pictures under the same lighting conditions than this GE X5.Macro is decent when the lens focuses on the subject. I do not know if my unit had a defective flash, but most of the fun in life happens inside and at night. A camera with a decent low light performance is a plus for me. . It took me over 300 pictures to come to this conclusion. Most of my photos were taken under strong fluorescent lighting and they all came dark. Thanks to Aperture for Mac I was able to bring them back to life. However, it is ok to adjust 3 or 4 pictures with a photo editor not 100. The batteries last a long time. I used high capacity rechargeable batteries. Because of all of this facts I am returning it back to Amazon. I will shoot for a new model from another company. I was skeptic about a GE camera since most of my kitchen appliances are GE. I guess I learned my lesson. Next time I will stick to the companies who have been in the camera business for a long time.PS I performed firmware update from Ge before taking any pictures.

Reviews.Title: A Disappointment
Reviews.Author: av2009
Reviews.Content: I've had a Samsung 10 MP for about two years now that takes lovely pictures, but I was looking for something a little more. Normally, I'm very set on going into a store and testing a display camera out before I make a purchase, but I decided to give online camera shopping a try. I was really leaning toward purchasing a Canon or Nikon, but I found this little number. After reading reviews, researching sample images, and comparing prices, I was pretty impressed; however, when I received my camera and eagerly took it out of the box to start snapping pictures, I was so disappointed. The photos were so blurry and not what I was hoping for at all. Despite playing with different settings, the images were all the same. I do NOT plan on purchasing a GE camera in the future, and I do NOT recommend this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: Precio Justo y exelente camara
Reviews.Author: Rubén Villalba
Reviews.Content: Hola Chic@s,Es una de las mejores compras que he realizado, el precio es justo y las prestaciones de la camara valen la pena, es del tipo semiprofesional y para lo que la utilizo es excelente, la programación y su modo de uso no es nada complicado.Espero les sirva estas palabras si fuera ustedes la compro. Bueno eso hice.Chao y se cuidan.

Reviews.Title: Camera has frozen almost every time I turn it on
Reviews.Author: Tia
Reviews.Content: This is by far the worst camera I have ever had. It has frozen almost every time I've turned it on and the lens won't retract if this happens so you just have to keep fussing with it until the camera turns on and you can turn it back off... unfortunately I don't live in the U.S. or Canada so I'm not covered by warranty...

Reviews.Title: GE 15x Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Wink
Reviews.Content: Nice camera and is easy to operate.  In auto mode, it will blur subjects that move (maybe a little worse than name brand cameras I have owned).

Reviews.Title: Damaged when i recieved!
Reviews.Author: Amenda M
Reviews.Content: When i recieved my camera it would freeze and make weird noises! Fed Ex must have tried to get it to me really fast- a result of half-doing the job correctly.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Texas gal
Reviews.Content: I love my camera!  I don't know all the ins and outs of it yet, but it takes greatpictures so far!

Reviews.Title: Well Built Camera, Poor Performance
Reviews.Author: el.bailador
Reviews.Content: The  GE X5 has many fine features. I didn't try them all yet but those I did, I was very disappointed with the results. Sometimes the photos came out clear and at other times they were blur. Sometimes the flash would fire and other times it wouldn't, even when I followed the directions on the instructional booklet and the accompanying CD. I returned the camera to Amazon for an exchange which they promptly honored. I received the new camera a couple of days ago. Features that were not working on the returned camera are working okay on this new camera. The flash works good, the green frame is visible, and the photos are clear. I have yet to try the other features of the X5. I'll post another review when I have tried them all. (Please note that review of 2 stars is based on the returned GE X5 camera).

Reviews.Title: 1 Day with the X5
Reviews.Author: Mr. James D. Rose
Reviews.Content: Just got this Camera yesterday, and played with it for a few hours.  It has many features, but seem to have shortcommings, for example I cant find a manual focus, the only connector is a USB (cant connect to TV), no power connector, complicated menus.  It seems to take good photos in auto mode, 14 megapixels, 15X zoom, but when examining a photo max magnification is 8X. I guess for $140 it's a remarkable buy, but could be so much better. The Video recording is fair, MOV extension played on VLC media player, good as any still camera.  Will comment more with a little more experience.  Did take some rather nice photos of ancient coins (macro on and off).Jim

Reviews.Title: Hate  it!
Reviews.Author: BonnyLu1389
Reviews.Content: Piece of expensive junk. I'd always been told to purchase Canon cameras. Now I know why. This one was worthless.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: robert gracely
Reviews.Content: It more technical than point and shoot camera. It us a bridge type camera for those who want to one day move up to a mosttechnical camera.

Reviews.Title: GE 5X Camera
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Wilson
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera. It will do very nicely for my picture taking. With some more practice with it I'll be taking great pictures!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Ameldra Williams
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much. perfectly fine and worked great for my photography needs. Will shop here againMs. A Williams

Reviews.Title: does it all
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Dehart
Reviews.Content: love this camera has all the features u need plus i love the video it palys a very long time you have so many options as the bigger more expensive ones the camera comes with so much you cant believe the price my ffiends cant belive what it can do great camera for price no problems with it

Reviews.Title: need battreies
Reviews.Author: JAMES WILSON
Reviews.Content: Ok this camera is horrible first you need batteries, they burn fast, and it does not take good pictures, need a tripod and it will be a great camera, but the shaking of people shows up in the pictures even with the shake thing on. I use my phone with gives me the same quality of pictures....POOR

Reviews.Title: like it a lot so far
Reviews.Author: cjb20938
Reviews.Content: just received this camera yesterday and i have taken a few pictures with it so far, and the quality is very good. the only thing i do not like is how long it takes to zoom out and the noises it makes as it is zooming out. but for the price you can't beat the camera. its small and easy to hold in my smaller hands but its not small enough to to fit in a purse or pocket but thats exactly what i wanted.

Reviews.Title: GE 14MP Digtal
Reviews.Author: Brenda M.
Reviews.Content: I really love my new camera. I just need to learn all the settings. Takes great pictures,but I had to buy littuhm batteries or I was replacing them daily. The zoom is great still need to figure out all the bells on the camera but overall I love it.

Reviews.Title: Starting to fail
Reviews.Author: Lejune
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for only a few weeks and it is already starting to malfunction. Every so often when I take a picture the screen says, "Unable to read Image" or something similar to that.If this keeps up or worsens I'm going to ask for a refund. I have been taking care of the camera like it was a newborn, so this is unacceptable.

Reviews.Title: Better Cameras Out There
Reviews.Author: KFGS24
Reviews.Content: I purchased a GE X5 Power Pro from Sears.  The camera was O.K. and easy to use but I had more bad shots than good.  I used all of the different setting and adjustments but found the camera was just not up to par.  I returned it to Sears.  I then purchased the Fuji S1800 for about the same price through Amazon.  The Fuji is a much better camera.  It is easy to use and the Macro shots are excellent.  It's a keeper.

Reviews.Title: GE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: FRANCES
Reviews.Content: I FEEL THAT THIS CAMERA IS TOO CUMBERSON FOR ME, IT TAKES NICE PICS BUT THE FLASH DOES NOT PROVIDE ENOUGH LIGHT IN SOME SITUATIONS. A GOOD CAMERA FOR AMATEURS!

Reviews.Title: GE Camera
Reviews.Author: Firebirds Rule
Reviews.Content: It was not what I was hoping for.  I bought it for the sports package to take pictures of my kids.  It takes great pictures if you everyone is standing still, but if they are moving everything is blurry.  I was also looking forward to the continuous shooting, but that does not work that well either.  I realize it was a cheaper camera, but i was hoping for more.

Reviews.Title: oik 4 t price
Reviews.Author: Hector Onofre
Reviews.Content: i order black got it red lens cover seems it's too big falling off all t time same price in Walmart working fine my nexus s 4g is 8 megapixels and take better quality pics take it from there nothing else to say

Reviews.Title: GENERAL BRIDGE CAMERA REVIEW
Reviews.Author: Marc S. Smilen
Reviews.Content: This GE is a great camera!  I bought a fujifilm s5200 from a pawn shop, an impulse buy.  My fujifilm takes 2gb cards; this GE has much more memory capability than my fujifilm,  and my fujifilm camera is only 5.1 megapixels.  you dont need 14 megampixels to take a great photo.  But its nice if you want to enlarge photos.  but all the programmable stuff and autofocus of the GE, is great stuff.  lot of stuff in this camera is not new on the market.  I did not yet buy this GE camera.  But I understand what it offers!!!!  Its a great camera for a great price, if you dont want or dont need an SLR camera.  An SLR camera will let you change the lens.  but a 15X zoom is nice.  My biggest piece of advice would be to try and find out if the zoom works when the video mode is on.

Reviews.Title: It's All Great But....
Reviews.Author: Amaryllis
Reviews.Content: But the memory SUCKS.I just got this camera in the mail, and I could only take 3 pictures and/or 12 seconds of video, without the screen flashing saying that the memory's full!This problem is easily solved with the purchase of a memory card (as I'm ordering right now), but still....Other than that I'm finding this camera great for the price!

Reviews.Title: bad  camera
Reviews.Author: ben  Albuq NM
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my granddaughter and having owned many cameras in my life this is the worst camera I have ever seen and trying to get in touch with anyone for help seems now to be impossible so I guess I simple have to accept my loss, I probably won't buy on Amazon anymore

Reviews.Title: GE X5
Reviews.Author: Betzaida Martinez
Reviews.Content: Es una version mini profesional, para los que quieren una DSRL pero no saben usar este tipo de camara tan complicado y desean fotos de alta calidad.  Esta es la mejor seleccion.

Reviews.Title: handyman
Reviews.Author: jesus rafael reyes
Reviews.Content: la camara GE 500 es por su presio,una camara muy buena yo la recomiendo a que la conpren.

Reviews.Title: Long wait and a big let down on performance!
Reviews.Author: tipstir "My Professional Review"
Reviews.Content: I had to rush in one day for the wife to use on her trip. Boy she didn't like the GE X5 Pro at all! Told me it was very heavy, and the pictures came out blur or wasn't sharp enough! I had tested the came myself and compared it with Olympus SP-600UZ HD. Aimed and shot the same image. GE X5 Pro has 14MP while the Olympus has 12MP but it has 720p HD. Both have 15x Optical Zoom. What I didn't like about the GE X5 Pro was even with the Blur, Shake etc. the picture always came out the same way. The Zoom lens stick out in this SLR like point and shoot. Still I would have thought the image would be better but sure enough it wasn't what I had expected. The camera looks like Fuji S-1800, which I also had when that was first introduce. I had to send that back because all I had seen the LCD panel was blue snow noise. Not even  Flash the firmware could fix that issue. So I had to send that back. Got the Olympus instead! Well this was a bad mistake and I've sent this one back because of the blur issue and LCD panel was snowy in low to medium light. Outdoors it was okay no noise. But the view finder wasn't optical more digital view. Shooting with the LCD Panel outdoors I  had aimed an tested one last shut but with max lens did show up well but the picture that came out was blurry. Don't get me wrong the camera looks good and shoots so, so, but not the greatest pictures though. Transfer from GE X5 Pro to Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit worked but out of 93 shots it had frozen. But when I had gone to looked all the images did transfer okay but the OSD shown me the wrong info from the GE X5 Pro. I am not going for exchange for a new one I'll just get another Olympus but not a SLR Like type since the wife won't use those type again after the GE X5 Pro experience.

Reviews.Title: CHECK this out
Reviews.Author: Guy Joel CHIRWISA
Reviews.Content: YEA THIS CAMERA ,IS VERY DIFFICULT TO USE, TOO HEAVY AND DON'T HAVE A RECHARGEABLE BATTERY. i PERSONALLY DIDN'T LIKE IT. AND I COULDN'T SEE ALL TECHNIC SPECIFICATION PRIOR MY PURCHASE. IF I HAD DIFFERENT VIEWS AND ENOUGH PICS OF THE PRODUCT, I WOULD NEVER BUY IT.
